question: Which among the following benefits is associated with RuPay?
option1: International transactions lead to higher transactions costs. Such costs can be reduced by using RuPay
option2: Users will get alerts for every transaction made through RuPay Card
option3: Processing Fees for RuPay card compared with regular debit/credit cards will be considerably lower
explanation: RuPay is an Indian card scheme conceived and launched by the National Payments Corporation of India on 26 March 2012. It was created to fulfil the Reserve Bank of India's desire to have a domestic, open, multilateral system of payments in India.
